actions.name: Elemental Aura

cost.trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.
Effect: The user chooses one of Fire, Flying, Ground or Water-Type and deals 25% more damage with attacks of the chosen type.

actions.name: Elemental Aura
actions.description: Passive: The user deals 5% bonus damage with Fire, Flying, Ground or Water-Type attacks and receives 10% less damage from Fire, Flying, Ground or Water-Type attacks.

system.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.
Effect: The user chooses one of Fire, Flying, Ground or Water-Type and deals 25% more damage with attacks of the chosen type. Passive: The user deals 5% bonus damage with Fire, Flying, Ground or Water-Type attacks and receives 10% less damage from Fire, Flying, Ground or Water-Type attacks.
